verses.verse: Then <S%G3767><s%> verily <S%G3303><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> covenant had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5707><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> ordinances <S%G1345><s%> of divine service <S%G2999><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> a worldly <S%G2886><s%> sanctuary <S%G39><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> there was <S%G2680><s%> a tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> made <S%G2680><s%> <S%G5681><s%>; the first <S%G4413><s%>, wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5037><s%> was the candlestick <S%G3087><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the table <S%G5132><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the shewbread <S%G4286><s%> <S%G740><s%>; which <S%G3748><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5743><s%> the sanctuary <S%G39><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> veil <S%G2665><s%>, the tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5746><s%> the Holiest of all <S%G39><s%> <S%G39><s%>;

Which had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the golden <S%G5552><s%> censer <S%G2369><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the ark <S%G2787><s%> of the covenant <S%G1242><s%> overlaid <S%G4028><s%> <S%G5772><s%> round about <S%G3840><s%> with gold <S%G5553><s%>, wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> was the golden <S%G5552><s%> pot <S%G4713><s%> that had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> manna <S%G3131><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Aharon's <S%G2><s%> rod <S%G4464><s%> that budded <S%G985><s%> <S%G5660><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the tables <S%G4109><s%> of the covenant <S%G1242><s%>;

And <S%G1161><s%> over <S%G5231><s%> it <S%G846><s%> the cherubims <S%G5502><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%> shadowing <S%G2683><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the mercyseat <S%G2435><s%>; of <S%G4012><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> speak <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5721><s%> particularly <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3313><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when these things <S%G5130><s%> were <S%G2680><s%> thus <S%G3779><s%> ordained <S%G2680><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, the Kohanim <S%G2409><s%> went <S%G1524><s%> <S%G5748><s%> always <S%G1275><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3303><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> tabernacle <S%G4633><s%>, accomplishing <S%G2005><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the service <S%G2999><s%> of 'Elohim.

But <S%G1161><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> went the Kohen HaGodol <S%G749><s%> alone <S%G3441><s%> once <S%G530><s%> every year <S%G1763><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> he offered <S%G4374><s%> <S%G5719><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for the errors <S%G51><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%>:

The Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> signifying <S%G1213><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, that the way <S%G3598><s%> into the holiest of all <S%G39><s%> was <S%G5319><s%> not yet <S%G3380><s%> made manifest <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5771><s%>, while as the first <S%G4413><s%> tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> was <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> standing <S%G4714><s%>:

Which <S%G3748><s%> was a figure <S%G3850><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> then present <S%G1764><s%> <S%G5761><s%>, in <S%G2596><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> were offered <S%G4374><s%> <S%G5743><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sacrifices <S%G2378><s%>, that could <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5740><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> make <S%G5048><s%> him that did the service <S%G3000><s%> <S%G5723><s%> perfect <S%G5048><s%> <S%G5658><s%>, as pertaining to <S%G2596><s%> the conscience <S%G4893><s%>;

Which stood only <S%G3440><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> meats <S%G1033><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drinks <S%G4188><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> divers <S%G1313><s%> washings <S%G909><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> carnal <S%G4561><s%> ordinances <S%G1345><s%>, imposed <S%G1945><s%> <S%G5740><s%> on them until <S%G3360><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> of reformation <S%G1357><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> being come <S%G3854><s%> <S%G5637><s%> an Kohen HaGodol <S%G749><s%> of good things <S%G18><s%> to come <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> a greater <S%G3187><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> more perfect <S%G5046><s%> tabernacle <S%G4633><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> made with hands <S%G5499><s%>, that is to say <S%G5123><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> building <S%G2937><s%>;

Neither <S%G3761><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of goats <S%G5131><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> calves <S%G3448><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> he entered in <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%> once <S%G2178><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the holy place <S%G39><s%>, having obtained <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5642><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> redemption <S%G3085><s%> for us.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of bulls <S%G5022><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of goats <S%G5131><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the ashes <S%G4700><s%> of an heifer <S%G1151><s%> sprinkling <S%G4472><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the unclean <S%G2840><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, sanctifieth <S%G37><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the purifying <S%G2514><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%>:

How much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> shall <S%G2511><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the eternal <S%G166><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> offered <S%G4374><s%> <S%G5656><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> without spot <S%G299><s%> to 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, purge <S%G2511><s%> <S%G5692><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> from <S%G575><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> serve <S%G3000><s%> <S%G5721><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> for this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the mediator <S%G3316><s%> of the new <S%G2537><s%> testament <S%G1242><s%>, that <S%G3704><s%> by means <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%>, for <S%G1519><s%> the redemption <S%G629><s%> of the transgressions <S%G3847><s%> that were under <S%G1909><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> testament <S%G1242><s%>, they which are called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5772><s%> might receive <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5632><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> inheritance <S%G2817><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> a testament <S%G1242><s%> is, there must also of necessity <S%G318><s%> be <S%G5342><s%> <S%G5745><s%> the death <S%G2288><s%> of the testator <S%G1303><s%> <S%G5642><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> a testament <S%G1242><s%> is of force <S%G949><s%> after <S%G1909><s%> men are dead <S%G3498><s%>: otherwise <S%G1893><s%> it is of <S%G2480><s%> no <S%G3379><s%> strength <S%G2480><s%> <S%G5719><s%> at all <S%G3379><s%> while <S%G3753><s%> the testator <S%G1303><s%> <S%G5642><s%> liveth <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.
Whereupon <S%G3606><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> testament was dedicated <S%G1457><s%> <S%G5769><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G5259><s%> Mosheh <S%G3475><s%> had spoken <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5685><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> precept <S%G1785><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the Torah <S%G3551><s%>, he took <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5631><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of calves <S%G3448><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of goats <S%G5131><s%>, with <S%G3326><s%> water <S%G5204><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> scarlet <S%G2847><s%> wool <S%G2053><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hyssop <S%G5301><s%>, and sprinkled <S%G4472><s%> <S%G5656><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> the book <S%G975><s%> <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>,

Saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, This <S%G5124><s%> is the blood <S%G129><s%> of the testament <S%G1242><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> hath enjoined <S%G1781><s%> <S%G5662><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3668><s%> he sprinkled <S%G4472><s%> <S%G5656><s%> with blood <S%G129><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> the tabernacle <S%G4633><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the vessels <S%G4632><s%> of the ministry <S%G3009><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> almost <S%G4975><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are <S%G2511><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> purged <S%G2511><s%> <S%G5743><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> shedding of blood <S%G130><s%> is <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5736><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> remission <S%G859><s%>.

It was therefore <S%G3767><s%> necessary <S%G318><s%> that the patterns <S%G5262><s%> of things <S%G3303><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%> should be purified <S%G2511><s%> <S%G5745><s%> with these <S%G5125><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> the heavenly things <S%G2032><s%> themselves <S%G846><s%> with better <S%G2909><s%> sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> these <S%G5025><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> is <S%G1525><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the holy places <S%G39><s%> made with hands <S%G5499><s%>, which are the figures <S%G499><s%> of the true <S%G228><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> itself <S%G846><s%>, now <S%G3568><s%> to appear <S%G1718><s%> <S%G5683><s%> in the presence <S%G4383><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>:

Nor <S%G3761><s%> yet that <S%G2443><s%> he should offer <S%G4374><s%> <S%G5725><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> often <S%G4178><s%>, as <S%G5618><s%> the Kohen HaGodol <S%G749><s%> entereth <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5736><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the holy place <S%G39><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> year <S%G1763><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> of others <S%G245><s%>;

For then <S%G1893><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5713><s%> he <S%G846><s%> often <S%G4178><s%> have suffered <S%G3958><s%> <S%G5629><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> once <S%G530><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the end <S%G4930><s%> of the world <S%G165><s%> hath he appeared <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5769><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> put away <S%G115><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> of himself <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3745><s%> it is appointed <S%G606><s%> <S%G5736><s%> unto men <S%G444><s%> once <S%G530><s%> to die <S%G599><s%> <S%G5629><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> the judgment <S%G2920><s%>:

So <S%G3779><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> was once <S%G530><s%> offered <S%G4374><s%> <S%G5685><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> bear <S%G399><s%> <S%G5629><s%> the sins <S%G266><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%>; and unto them that look <S%G553><s%> <S%G5740><s%> for him <S%G846><s%> shall he appear <S%G3700><s%> <S%G5701><s%> <S%G1537><s%> the second time <S%G1208><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%>.
